title: David’s Psalm of Thanksgiving
summary: After placing the Ark in a tent in Jerusalem, David appoints Levites to lead worship and offers sacrifices. He delivers a psalm of thanksgiving that praises God’s greatness and covenant faithfulness.

faq.question: What was the purpose of David’s psalm?
faq.answer: To praise God for His covenant and call Israel to worship and remember His deeds.

faq.question: Who was assigned to lead worship?
faq.answer: Levites like Asaph were appointed to minister before the Ark.
